Datum.description: The date of the event in the format DD.MM.YYYY

akad. Grad.description: The academic degree of the individual involved

Vorname.description: The first name of the individual involved

Nachname.description: The last name of the individual involved

Funktion.description: The role or function of the individual in the event. Options: 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5

Tagungsname.description: The name of the conference or meeting

Land.description: The country where the event is held

National/Internat..description: Indicates whether the event is Nat. (National) or Int. (International)

Tagung an TU.description: Indicates whether the event was held at the TU (Technische Universität). Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Veröffentlichung.description: Indicates whether the event was published

Anzahl Teilnehmer.description: The number of participants in the event

Freigabe.description: Indicates whether the event is approved or released. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Gewicht.description: Indicates whether weight is applicable. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Regel.description: The rule or regulation associated with the event, represented as a numeric value
